testcase.name: Cancel checkout
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Cancel checkout Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 4.926s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.060s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.209s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.213s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.241s And User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.216s When User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.258s And User clicks Cancel on overview ... passed in 1.214s Then User navigates to the cart page ... passed in 0.008s And The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Error on empty checkout fields
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Error on empty checkout fields Given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 4.872s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.060s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.225s And User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.215s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.257s And User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.216s When User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.256s Then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.232s And Error: Last Name is required should be displayed ... passed in 0.014s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
